id: list-templates
title: "List templates"
description: "This endpoint returns a paginated list of templates that are associated with a specific object type within a space. Templates provide preâ€‘configured structures for creating new objects. Each template record contains its identifier, name, and icon, so that clients can offer users a selection of templates when creating objects."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List templates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/types/{type_id}/templates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint returns a paginated list of templates that are associated with a specific object type within a space. Templates provide preâ€‘configured structures for creating new objects. Each template record contains its identifier, name, and icon, so that clients can offer users a selection of templates when creating objects.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"The version of the API to use","in":"header","name":"Anytype-Version","required":true,"schema":{"default":"2025-04-22","type":"string"}},{"description":"Space ID","in":"path","name":"space_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Type ID","in":"path","name":"type_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set","in":"query","name":"offset","schema":{"default":0,"type":"integer"}},{"description":"The number of items to return","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"default":100,"maximum":1000,"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
